parameters.description: The accepted file types. Enter a comma-separated list of the file extensions (such as .jpg) that the user can upload.
parameters.label: Accepted Formats

parameters.description: Lets the user upload multiple files.
parameters.label: Allow Multiple Files

parameters.description: The IDs of the uploaded files. Store this value in a text collection variable.
parameters.label: Content Document IDs

parameters.description: The Version IDs of the uploaded files. Store this value in a text collection variable.
parameters.label: Content Version IDs

parameters.description: Displays the component in a disabled state.
parameters.label: Disabled

parameters.description: The text on the file upload button.
parameters.label: File Upload Label

parameters.description: The tooltip to display when the user hovers over the component.
parameters.label: Hover Text

parameters.description: The ID of the record to associate the files with. If no value is passed, the component is disabled.
parameters.label: Related Record ID

parameters.description: The names of the uploaded files. Store this value in a text collection variable.
parameters.label: Uploaded File Names

parameters.description: Prevents the user from modifying or copying the value.
parameters.label: Disabled

parameters.description: The label that appears above the email field.
parameters.label: Label

parameters.description: Text that appears in the field when it's empty. Use placeholder text to give users a hint about what to enter in the field.
parameters.label: Placeholder Text

parameters.description: Prevents the user from modifying the value, but not from copying it.
parameters.label: Read Only

parameters.description: Requires the user to enter a value.
parameters.label: Required

parameters.description: To provide a default value, set this attribute's value. To use the user-entered value elsewhere in your flow, store this attribute's output value in a variable.
parameters.label: Value

parameters.description: The label that appears above the slider.
parameters.label: Label

parameters.description: The maximum value of the slider range. The default maximum is 100.
parameters.label: Range Maximum

parameters.description: The minimum value of the slider range. The default minimum is 0.
parameters.label: Range Minimum

parameters.description: Controls the size of the slider. Enter one of these values: x-small, small, medium, large.
parameters.label: Slider Size

parameters.description: Divides the slider into a set of steps. Example step sizes include 0.1, 5, and 10. The default value is 1.
parameters.label: Step Size

parameters.description: The number represented by the slider position. To pre-set the value, set this attribute's value. To use the user-entered value elsewhere in your flow, store this attribute's output value in a variable.
parameters.label: Value

parameters.description: The help text for pattern
parameters.label: Help text for pattern

parameters.description: The SObject the user has selected
parameters.label: The selected Record

parameters.description: The prompt
parameters.label: User Prompt

parameters.description: To give City a default value, set this attribute's value. To use the user-entered value elsewhere in your flow, store this attribute's output value in a variable.
parameters.label: City Value

parameters.description: The active countries configured in state and country picklists. To override the options, set this attribute to a comma-delimited set of countries.
parameters.label: Country Options

parameters.description: To give Country a default value, set this attribute's value. To use the user-entered value elsewhere in your flow, store this attribute's output value in a variable.
parameters.label: Country Value

parameters.description: Label for the heading that appears above the group of address fields.
parameters.label: Label

parameters.description: To give Postal Code a default value, set this attribute's value. To use the user-entered value elsewhere in your flow, store this attribute's output value in a variable.
parameters.label: Postal Code Value

parameters.description: The active states configured in state and country picklists. To override the options, set this attribute to a comma-delimited set of states.
parameters.label: State/Province Options

parameters.description: To give State a default value, set this attribute's value. To use the user-entered value elsewhere in your flow, store this attribute's output value in a variable.
parameters.label: State/Province Value

parameters.description: To give Street a default value, set this attribute's value. To use the user-entered value elsewhere in your flow, store this attribute's output value in a variable.
parameters.label: Street Value

parameters.description: The API name of a lookup field on the source object.
parameters.label: Field API Name

parameters.description: Label for flow lookup.
parameters.label: Label

parameters.description: The API name of the source object.
parameters.label: Object API Name

parameters.description: Record Id value for the lookup.
parameters.label: Record Id

parameters.description: Record name of the selected lookup record.
parameters.label: Record Name

parameters.description: Requires the user to enter a value.
parameters.label: Required
